website_summaries.verdict: A step up from most of the battery operated toy ATV models for kids.
pros: Rubber tires like a real ATV
Goes faster than other kids' models at up to 9.5 mph
Battery lasts for a good amount of time
No problems on rough terrain or inclines
cons: While the manufacturer officially recommends this for teens
It will likely be too small for most teens to enjoy and is better for pre-teen children

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: To be an electric cart this thing is built really well. Real tires and brakes along with metal frame. My son is 6 and it fits him perfect. In the video our driveway is a hill and it runs right up with no worries. Update:: May 28th he’s still going strong on it and everything is holding up . Battery is still strong
customer_reviews.author: chris collins

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our 5 year old, who is the size of a 7 year old (50+ lbs). We were looking for something a little bigger than the typical electric power car, but weren't ready for a gas powered bike and this was it! It goes fast enough to keep him entertained (10 mph), but slow enough to be safe. It can make sharp turns, so not having reverse really isn't an issue. He can even take it in our field and does fine off road. Overall we have been really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batteries or a Lemon?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 7 year old grandson for Christmas, along with a Razor Dirt Bike for our 5 year old grandson. The dirt bike goes 4 to 5 times faster than the quad. In fact, the quad is so slow and sluggish I can walk slowly beside it at full throttle, and it will hardly climb the apron of our driveway. I suspect the batteries are bad, or maybe we purchased a lemon. I will contact Razor tomorrow. Probably will try to return it and purchase another dirt bike. Feel bad for my Grandson who was quite disappointed in the way it ran.
customer_reviews.author: Stix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 4 wheeler....
customer_reviews.text: This is the best 4 wheeler ever. I was so worried that my 3 year old grandson would be to small to ride it, but it was like it was made for him. He loves it. Surprised as how fast it is, and that its battery powered. It was here in less then a week and well packaged. So happy with our purchase from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 3 year old son for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old son for Christmas. Very quick delivery and definitely age appropriate. It took my son only a few minutes to get the hang of driving it and he hasn't stopped yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: A+ product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, picture speaks for it's self. I added a governor I saw on YouTube. A 5k ..
customer_reviews.author: JKU

customer_reviews.title: Great power!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one I could find after doing a bunch of research on little power wheel vehicles. This has real tires and has enough power to tow things around and drive over a really rough yard. I can also ride on it at 180lbs over bumps and grass with no problems! It doesn’t have quite enough power to tote me up a hill but that’s not a problem. We are big fans of it. It doesn’t reverse, but we can deal with that. Great price for the quality! Have had it for two months now with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Quad, comes fully assembled... Great Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected. Loved that all the quad was fully assembled and only had to put the steering when on. It has tons of power and lasted the full hour of use. Only wish the charger was more universal as I know I will eventually lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Electronic systems are not built weatherproof, will take some dad work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my four-year-old 4 months ago. Within the first few weeks, I started to notice issues with the electronics. Randomly not responsive on some days and not charging. Soon after, it became a vegetable. Investigated a little further and found that the wiring harnesses are extremely cheap. Removed them and installed automotive grade harnesses. Three hours of labor later and No problems since. Going on 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Rugged and powerful
customer_reviews.text: It arrives 95% assembled. Just bolt on the handlebars and thats it. It arrived fully charged ready to go. Very powerful and fast for a battery power quad. Im impressed. Very rugged. Steel frame, disc brakes, rear shock, tube bumpers, and more. This little rig is the real deal. My 6 year old keeps up with his buddy who has a gas powered one. Battery lasts a loooong time. We have consistently run well over an hour or more and the low battery light has never come on. Great starter quad for a kid who is too old for power wheels but too young for a gas power quad
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time, money, or headache.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The first I ordered for my son for Christmas. It would either do nothing at all or stick full throttle, sending him once into the rear number of an SUV unable to stop. Amazon swapped it for a replacement no problem and after 5-6 rides without issue once again it would not run. Now after finally finding a UPS drop off with a box big enough to ship it back in, my refund was almost $100 less than my purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality except
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality except..... there is no reverse (pretty sad considering how much this costs). So your kids will have to constantly jump off and pull it back to get out of tight areas. It does have a variable throttle which is great. The motor is reversible... they just don't give you a switch (I guess they think driving backwards at 8 mph is dangerous! Me too which is why I make my kids wear a helmet.) I added a reversible switch and made it reversible and also added 2 more batteries... now it can drive about 20 miles per charge and has reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny R

customer_reviews.title: This four-wheeler rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this four-wheeler. We even ordered one and it wouldn't charge and we sent it back and they sent another one, no problem!! The kids fight over the four-wheeler all the time, we should probably get another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: A 3 year old seems a bit young for this Quad, but with my supervision/guidance, and safety gear, it’s actually a lot of fun for both of us. If you don’t have the patience, or time to guide a kid this young, then don’t bother- this quad is heavy, powerful and can easily become dangerous. The Quad is durable, unlike other brands you’ll find here and cruises fast enough to entertain my 10 year old nephew. Also it’s Future proof, so I won’t have a plastic power wheels collecting dust a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not Running 2 weeks in
customer_reviews.text: After about week and a half it randomly quit working. For the next week i could move the wires around and it would start going again but the other day it quit completely. You cN hear a click but motor is not going. For the amount we paid we shouldn't have to deal with this a couple weeks in. Now less then 3 months and there is a clicking noise like the bearings are going out on the rear tire. Went to order new ones and they are out of stock!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Not what you would expect from an expensive toy.
customer_reviews.text: I am sending it back it’s not impressive. Got it for my 8 year old twin girls, we just made a one acre track mostly level. This wheeler has no suspicion, make a funny noise of metal clicking, the ride is hard on the girls body, anything will make them bump and get thrown around. It’s nice to have on grass level ground and that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: J.F

customer_reviews.title: Not put together well.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed good, until first use and the rear wheel fell off. It caused my son to flip. It appears that two major nuts and bolts were completely missed during assembly. He thankfully wasn't hurt or there would have been a lawsuit. I would skip this product as they don't take care to assemble it completely and it goes pretty fast and a wreck could really hurt a child.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This is as close as you'll get to the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: The quad arrives in a huge box so you have barely anything to put together. The only thing I had to do was put the handlebars on. My four and five-year-old had such a good time. Super easy to ride. I charge the battery once and we've already ridden two days. I've had real Honda 50 quads, This is as close as you'll get to the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vass

customer_reviews.title: Razor dirt quad
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 4 year old son for his birthday. It was easy to get it up and running, but too fast for his skill level, so we bought a potentiometer to limit the speed until he can ride at a faster speed without giving Mom a heart attack. Battery charge lasts for over half hour of riding, and the rubber tires give great traction on all surfaces. Very happy with this purchase and hope it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Topples over easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old. Probably still a little young for it but it’s fun. First ride around the yard and he flipped it. Will fall over if you take sharp turns. No battery issues so far. Update: Dropped to a 2 star rating. Have had it for 1 month and the breaks are engaging every 10 seconds without breaking while the accelerator is turned. Annoying and can’t seem to get them to stop. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: in
customer_reviews.text: This Quad will last a long time! My daughter is 7 years old and has been using it since the age of 6. My 15 year old likes to ride the Quad as well too. It will hold up to a lot of abuse and keep on going. It is worth the extra money then the other power wheels because of the actual tires and not plastic. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a quality product. My personal opinion this is better then power wheels. I hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Janette Kuzma

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 'big' young kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 yr old son's bday - he LOVES it. It has just enough 'get up and go' to be fast but not super scary. I think it's perfect for a young kid that is too old for the slow/baby stuff but not yet old enough for the real fast stuff. Battery lasts a long time and is easy to plug in to charge. We've used this at the shore also and it has held up well to the salt air/water around (we rinse it though frequently). My son wears his bike helmet while riding the quad and it's just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burke

customer_reviews.title: Razor 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 yr old grandson. It fits him just right, and he had no trouble catching on to controling it. It is not a toy , by no means, this thing flys, and can go over just about anything. It was delivered by Amazon Delivery, with which you can track the delivery route right to your door. It came practically all assembled. The only thing we had to do was put the handlebars on.
customer_reviews.author: JLee

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about 20 mins then electric cut out and never worked again. Razor technical support was terrible and they told me I had to drive it out of state to their nearest repair shop. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the most fun EVER!!!!! We got it for the three year old and seven year old to share. It's a little small for the seven year old but she had never driven a four wheeler before so it was perfect to start her out. The three year old kills it!! She rides til it dies and has a blast. We take this with us to our riding place and the kids follow us on our full size atv's. They are slow but we wouldn't want them to be flying off so it's fine. I recommend this to anyone with toddlers who love to play outside. SO fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: jason anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this. The construction is solid and far better reliability wise than some of the plastic jeeps and 4-wheelers. (Had two of those previously) Definitely worth the extra spent on this one. Only negative is that there is zero front suspension so the little gets jarred around a bit if the terrain is not perfectly smooth, and there is no throttle limiter. I went online and found a quick cheap mod to limit the throttle, but it didn’t take long for him to be comfortable and controlled at full throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Was great dealing with all of the
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing to say the least. Amazon Was great dealing with all of the, the shipping was fast and so was the refund. This review is on the four wheeler. First off the battery would charge, ran for about a half hour total, let it charge for a day, and nothing. Then My son was pushing it to move it, ran it into the door frame, not hard, and the steering piece broke. Thankfully he wasn't riding it when it did. I'm really disappointed with this item, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product for bigger kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I have searched and searched for something to get my son since he has outgrown his ride on battery powered tractor that he has had since he was 2. He is now 6 and the battery couldn't keep up. All the bigger ride on vehicles I found were ones that he could ride for only another year or 2. This quad is for 8+, so I know it will last him many more years. Thanks razor for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dinvir Miller

customer_reviews.title: This thing is just awesome. My daughter rides it on our cul-de-sac and ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just awesome. My daughter rides it on our cul-de-sac and also around the backyard and it does as well on pavement as it does on grass. The battery lasts quite some time (maybe 40 minutes) and it is zippy and quick, but not so quick that it will scare kids. My daughter is 8 and has no problems controlling it. The ride is also much nicer than some comparable vehicles as they are real air-filled tires and not hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Y. HSUEH

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are absolutely worthless
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for a 35 pound 5 year old, battery would charge up enough to drive about 10 feet INSIDE THE HOUSE (perfectly flat and smooth surface). Recharge, go another 10 feet, absolute garbage. Forgot all about it, has been sitting in the shed untouched for the last 2 years because it's total junk. Seeing it again reminded me to go inside and write this review so maybe others don't get saddled with the same waste of hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: krial

customer_reviews.title: Good Quad
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his 5th Birthday. He loves this quad! It is powerful enough to make it up steep paved hills around our house and a few smaller off road trails. It’s holding up very well, the charge holds for days for him too riding for an hour here and an hours there. He will be riding this for at least another year or so, it carries his weight well at almost age 6.
customer_reviews.author: janelle M

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love these things
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love these things! They ride them every day after school over various terrains- pavement, gravel, pasture, woods. Just enough power to keep them interested (6yo and 8yo) but safe enough to keep us from freaking out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kyleware

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Really like the 4 wheeler. My son enjoys it. Battery has held up. Rear axle started squealing and got progressively worse. Called Razor and they told me to take it to a place that does warranty work for them. It took a while to get it back. Now it is running and sounding fine
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Branam

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love This Razor Quad
customer_reviews.text: 95% assembled and easy to put together. Four screws with handlebar clamps in predrilled and threaded holes. Sturdy aluminum frame, well built, plastic body air filled tires with monochrome shock for rear end. Easily maneuvers over gravel, asphalt grass and concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Ricks Farm Art and Sawmilling

customer_reviews.title: Internal problems.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 wheeler for my 6 year old grandson for Christmas 2019. He is very small, so no weight problem, and it was always run on parking lot asphalt. Winter didn’t allow for much riding. used in April when temperatures permitted. He had only used it four or five times. Heard a loud clunk and it was over! Called the warranty line and all we got was “ due to the COVID-19, we are not available to help you, leave a message and someone will contact you”. Three more phone calls to leave messages and 10 days later, still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Carla W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 9 year old granddaughter. So far it’s held up to its billing. The seat could stand to be a little taller for her but she doesn’t seem to mind. Battery life is acceptable. She hasn’t ridden it continuously in one day to completely discharge the battery. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheeler turned out to be a great investment. Grandkids age 4 through seven ride them every chance they get. Had a slight issue with getting the battery charged as we did not have it plugged in correctly. Was a bit surprised at how fast they go. Great quality super fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how much power this has hauling my 80 lbs son around without slowing down climbing up small hills. I was skeptical about the 40 minute usage time but it seems to last longer than that, possibly because my son rides it and rests then rides again. We were out at the park riding for at least 1:30 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem like the battery should have gone bad already
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for last years Christmas. He only weights about 40lbs. We followed the instructions and did the long first charge and have always charged it immediately after use for a minimum of 12hrs as instructed. He has used it about 15 times and now the battery will only last for 2 minutes.... Doesn't seem like the battery should have gone bad already. Also, we have issues with the brake rubbing due to the assembly being bent from the start. loosening the screw as illustrated in the instructions did not solve the problem. I had to disengage the assembly so it wouldn't rub any more...Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. My quad was dumped in my driveway on it's side. The box was damaged in numerous places. The stickers are coming up on the edges and had scratches on the black part of the quad. For over $500 i would expect a way better delivery and a product that is sufficient. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: HANDLE BAR BRACKET MISSING
customer_reviews.text: Received Razor Dirt Quad 4 Wheel Vehicle and the handle bar bracket was missing. Contacted customer support and part will be here in 4 weeks. I am extremely disappointed that the part was missing and that I have to wait another month to get missing part. When I spend $440 on a purchase I expect to receive everything I paid for. We had to cover up the quad, my grandson's birthday present, and wait for part to arrive before giving it to him. Also, no instruction booklet was enclosed. Very disappointing, and i doubt very much I will ever order an item this expensive from Amazon again. I cannot rate this product because I still have to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It functions fine, but the sound is so loud from the chain and gear.
customer_reviews.text: The sound from the chain and gear is so loud, it seems like I should have just purchased a gas powered kids atv. I bought another brand 36v electric atv for my older daughter. It was a knock off brand from China, and it’s awesome. You can hardly hear it, even when it cruising passed me at full speed. My son does not like riding his Razor atv, he sit with his sister and the 2 of them ride the 36v atv together.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in 2015. They are still going strong. The kids beat on them daily. I ride it from time to time and I am 220lbs but not suggested but this goes to show you that it is a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is my 3 yea olds favorite gift. He will not get off it. It does have some zip so since he is a little young you have to walk beside him. I also wish it wasn’t a twist throttle because as a kid, they don’t understand to let off it as much as if it were a thumb throttle. Sry nice and good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Zach R.

customer_reviews.title: Chain and breaks make noise after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 year old. The first couple of rides everything seemed great. Now with minimal use there is already ware and tare that is very noticeable. The chain clinks very loudly and the breaks squeak aggressively. Overall I think this is priced to high for the lack of quality. My son loves it but I for see a short future with it. Battery does last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: cody chandler

customer_reviews.title: This machine is not like any other power wheel ~ and we have 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 almost 6 yr old grandson. This machine is not like any other power wheel ~ and we have 3 of them... This little machine can really move.. The charge lasts usually all day!!! We plug it in at night and it is ready to go in the morning. We have rural property so the terrain is very hilly.. This little machine has no problems going up and down hills nor does it loose power going up. It has regular tires not the plastic ones.. they must know how to use a hand brake. It doesn't have a back up switch but that hasn't been a problem. I do recommend a helmet
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: if you  buy one of these you  need to be sure and get warranty with the unit.
customer_reviews.text: If you can do the work yourself then good, Had the unit 6 days and it broke down. I installed stronger Batteries and to no help. Called the Razor company for help. The lady tried over the phone to help, sent me a new E C U , electric kit for it. I installed myself. ( Yes I have worked on motorcycles for over 30 years and can do a lot of things. ) started over and called the Razor Co. again. Young man walked me over it again, came up with the motor not performing. At that point he ordered me another motor, still not here yet. Hope this fixes the unit as my grandson doesn't quiet understand.
customer_reviews.author: BUDDY COOK

customer_reviews.title: Great value .
customer_reviews.text: I have has this product know for 2 years. It is easy to maintain. It is a great starter 4 wheeler and easy for my 3 year old to operate. I have the original battery and it charges well. Battery only last about 20-30 minutes. I had to replace the usual charging port with aftermarket because the prongs failed. I also gave 4 stars because there is not a way to keep turned off other than the easy on-off switch which this is an issue because my 2 year olds can both operate the switch and the throttle. I created a lock for the brake due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun and dependable.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 9 year old love this. It does have a tendency to flip so you'll need to teach your kids to take the corners smoothly, not sharp and fast. Holds a charge well for a good half hour of riding. Great bang for the buck. You'll need a larger atv for kids over 10, as the leg room is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Seufert Photography

customer_reviews.title: I would not spend the money on this electric quad!
customer_reviews.text: This quad works ok for about 5 minutes after a full charge, then the battery starts to decline. I followed all of these directions to try and increase battery life, but nothing helped. Doesn't go uphill very well without a push. My grandson prefers the PowerWheel Jeep instead of the quad.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and super fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My 5 year old lives for it and his older brother and sister do too! One thing though - it tops out at 8 miles per hour (which is fun and safe) - but it has a lot of tork so if you have a manicured lawn it will turn it into a mud bogger track when the lawn is wet from heavy rains / spring thaw / and or mud season.
customer_reviews.author: Floto

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm often surprised at how quick this vehicle is. Especially when turning. You will need to run next to the Razor to keep up with your child. The company said the Razors would arrive in 2 - 3 weeks but they both arrived in 7 days. Just in time for my grandson's birthday. Anything eventful comes up, I'll update. Stay safe!
customer_reviews.author: Little Boy Blue

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quad. Box came very damaged and I was concerned the item might of been damaged as well but no all is well. Has good power and good handling. The only thing is the battery. You have to charge for a while and It doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: ERR

customer_reviews.title: Real life Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: These ATVs are so much fun for my kids. Unfortunately, because my kids ride them so hard, the battery life has significantly dwindled and doesn’t hold a charge well. Otherwise they are really fun, easy to handle and fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE QUAD
customer_reviews.text: Excellent atv, we gave it to our 4-year-old son at Christmas of the year 2019, and he has a lot of fun with the motorcycle, at the beginning we must be very aware of them, until we see that they already master it well, it is very good for them to learn to develop skills in handling quad, the tires are rubber and have excellent traction, the battery lasts a long time, you can use it for 3 days followed by the time of an hour with your breaks, without the need to charge it, I highly recommend it , in 2 years I hope to buy the white 500 watt.
customer_reviews.author: pedro lopez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It came almost completely assembled. It goes fast and is really fun. My sons who are 7 and 5 love it. Battery lasts a long time. I can even ride it at 180 lbs. The only problem with it is that it tears up the grass in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: cheech

customer_reviews.title: Razor ATV
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to take apart to replace battery. Battery is also saudered to the wires so they have be be cut when switching out the battery. Overall this has been a great purchase for our son and he loves it. He rides several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: We tried charging the battery according to the instructions. It showed a green light for full charge. After unplugging it for the length of time stated it would hardly run. We had trouble with it keeping power. We have charged it several times after that with the same problem. Since it’s for our grandchildren who live away from here it is not used often. We are hoping if we buy a new battery this will fix the problem. It is a very expensive riding toy for children and we are very unhappy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the smaller kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great 4 wheeler for the price!! Held CC a charge for hours while my son rode it all over the place. Was perfect for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love this ride on toy. I wish it came with a on/off key or something that would prevent the kids from riding when they are not supposed to. Also would be nice if the seat was a little longer for me second grandkid but they both still ride it at the same time. This was easy to assemble and is well built. I have no regrets buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Moody

customer_reviews.title: Good choice, nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks authentically like big-brother's gas-operated 4-wheeler. Easy to assemble what little assembly it required. Had our 10 year old granddaughter test-drive it in preparation for having it ready to give our 4-year old grandson for a Christmas present. Drives down our little bumpy road/driveway, etc., nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our son's 6th brithday, he's about 42 lbs and its perfect for him. He rides it for over an hour before needing a recharge. Goes pretty fast, but not too dangerously fast. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy, but decent machine
customer_reviews.text: Decent machine. Frame is very rigid and makes for a stiff ride. The foot rests are very high. Wish they were lower. My 7 yr old is 43” tall and 50 lbs and is almost too big for it. We have the peg perego version and were hoping this larger one would fit him better.. it is a bigger machine, but the foot rests are way too high. Really the whole machine is too high and top heavy. It’s very quiet, and well built tho. Battery life is good or better than the peg perego’s
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kohlwes

customer_reviews.title: Good size for ages 5+
customer_reviews.text: Good size for average size 5 year old or older. Little small for suggested 8 year old size. Definitely get a good helmet. These will tip if turned too fast at high speed. Battery lasts longer than power wheel and runs faster. Only has suspension on rear axle. Provides little dampening on rough surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Melton

customer_reviews.title: Great four wheeler

customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and it was “used” but supposed to be new with the exception of the packaging. Upon opening the four wheeler we found there was a hole in the side of the seat. The biggest bummer was the fact that even after charging it for 14 hours after recieiving it the longest it will last is about 5 minutes running. Very disappointed! I charged it again for a day and got the same results!!

customer_reviews.title: Tough, well built machine
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids abuse this 4wheeler and it just keeps going. They have had it for about a year now and it’s still going like the day we bought it. The only thing I’ve noticed is the charging port on the 4wheeler comes lose.

Charges easily, rubber wheels go over terrain easily. Will tip if on a hill - they were told not to be! - otherwise very stable. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Super cool little four wheeler same size as a gas ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cool little four wheeler same size as a gas 50cc quad. My 3 1/2 year old is a pro on this and it's big enough where he will be able to ride it for several years. It's pretty quick too, I weigh at least double the weight limit and it will go good with me on it. For the few extra dollars more than a plastic power wheel it's worth it, will even go through snow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, Fast, Stable. This was a B-day present for my 6 yr old son. At first he was a bit scared of it but soon after he was tearing up the yard. It holds charge for a long time. All you have to do is put on the handle bars, other than that ti it ready to go out of the box.

customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 5 year old son; he's big for his age. I would suggest waiting another year; size is not the issue. customer_reviews.author: ReB

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with this quad. I bought it for my 3 yr. old. She's not quite there yet so she rides behind her 5 yr. old brother. It takes a little getting use to the throttle after they get use to that they will be on their way. It can be unstable when turning for young ones. And if there not careful it will tip over, if they turn to sharp at full speed. If I was going to add anything it would be a reverse, but its easy to add it yourself. Maybe make it a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it. My only complaint is that the battery doesn't last long. Maybe 20 minutes. Other wise it works great and will go off road which is why I bought it. We needed something that can drive through dirt and grass.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small children

customer_reviews.title: ONLY review I've ever done!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. My now almost 8 year old triplets have had this a year now. They ride it almost every day. They could easily ride in the yard w/ two at a time (55 lbs each). It's not a scary speed, but fast enough for them to enjoy it. It only lasts about 45 minutes, but it has been a GREAT BUY! Would definitely buy again!

customer_reviews.text: That was what I expected. Easy to assemble, to open, to charge and really not comparable to the one I first got and returned.

customer_reviews.text: Great, no complaints from the little one thus far. Made a excellent Christmas Present.

customer_reviews.title: thus far have been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought for our grandson; thus far have been very happy with it. The real rubber tires are great for grip on grass. Seems solid and well made for the bit we've used it.
customer_reviews.author: R.F.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a toy!
customer_reviews.text: Forget about plastic junk ride on toys. This is a real quad! My 4 and 5 year olds love it. Tubular steel frame, pneumatic rubber tires, real mono-shock rear suspension, disc brake, and a twist throttle, set this quad worlds apart from the competition. Enough torque and traction to traverse rough terrain. Twice the speed of the other electric kids atvs, but not too fast for a 4 year old (with some riding experience). This is a well made machine that simply works! Just don't forget to charge it after each use. It even has enough power to pull two 5-year-olds at once around along a bumpy off-road trail. I highly recommend this quad for kids ages 4-8.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

Trying to return this product as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ciric

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed it today! Came fully charged. No reverse. I weigh 165lbs and my son weighs 37lbs he’s 3 years old. We rode on it together no issues still super fast! Love it, my son just has to get a hang of the brake. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danjhanna Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: My son will be 4 in 3 weeks and Santa brought him this 4 wheeler today....this thing is great. It is perfect! This is his first time stepping up from a power wheel vehicle but he has spent the last year watching videos of 4 wheelers and perhaps that helped, but he jumped right on and after an hour of dad going over "training sessions", was as natural as could be. Great size, not to big. Much faster than power wheels but not to fast. He handles brake and throttle just fine. I will happily update this review in due time but for now. ..we can't wait to wake up in the morning for more riding fun!
customer_reviews.author: K. James

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: This product is very disappointing, did not get by shipping date as stated when ordered, I ordered this for my son birthday and it came well After his birthday, the Razor battery does not hold a charge at all no matter how long u charge it the battery doesn’t work, my son is so sad and I feel bad but I have to return the product.
